This is education on your terms. Education that puts you in control of what, how, and where you learn. Specializing in online learning for more than 20 years, Purdue Global is a public, nonprofit university focused on providing a personalized and highly interactive experience. Gain the skills you need to get ahead today and the edge to conquer whatever comes next.

Personalized and Flexible

Build your future with an online degree plan that's created just for you, based on your learning needs, previous work, college, or military experience, and desired pace. New terms start monthly.

Affordable Online Programs

Purdue Global is committed to keeping your tuition costs as low as possible and helping you find the most efficient path to your degree. Ask about transfer credits, credit for work experience, and financial aid.

1-on-1 Mentoring and Support

Our dedicated faculty and support teams are experts in online education, giving you personalized assistance on career planning, coursework, and more. Online resources are also available 24 hours a day.

Why Choose Perdue Global?

  • Purdue Global is part of the respected Purdue University system, which was ranked in the top 10 best public universities in the U.S. by The Wall Street Journal/Times Higher Education.
  • Both the bachelor’s and master’s degrees programs in business administration are accredited by the Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs (ACBSP).
  • You have the option of trying out a Purdue Global undergraduate program for an introductory 3-week period. There’s no cost beyond the application fee.
  • You may be able to earn credits for prior college, work, or military experience.

Our online programs are flexible and tailored for working adults.

Choose the learning format that works best for you. Our Advisors work closely with you to determine the fastest and most affordable path to your degree.
